summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and increasing certain annual license fees and imposing an examination fee for fumigators and exterminators; amending Sections 90-2, 91-1, 97, 111, 172, 173, 173.1, 192-1, 261, 301, 302 and 331.1 of the License Code (Ordinance 48022), Sections 6, 6-A and 7 of Ordinance 73223, Section 2.010 of Ordinance 89715, Section 5.01.180 of Ordinance 104301, and Section 13 of Ordinance 84297.
